channel.description: Recent content in Aggregation on dntiontk.github.io

item.title: RSS Feed aggregation
item.description: This post is related to my previous post about civic code. I mentioned that there are multiple RSS feeds that the city maintains, and that this data is not particularly easy to find and parse. We are going to create an RSS feed aggregator creates a weekly summary and automatically creates a new post on this blog. For now, we’ll just use the City of Windsor Open Data Catalogue, but we’ll probably add more feeds in a future iteration.
